Package Run

Class ToDoList

  • java.lang.Object
    • Run.ToDoList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class ToDoList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Provides a very simple ToDoList. New items can be added at the end and removed from any other position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Method that filters tasks if they are completed

      Method that filters tasks if they are not completed.
      void editMenu()
      A submenu for the Edit task option of the Main menu that calls methods that modify sed tasks by different parameters
      void filterByProject()
      Method that filters the project according to the user input

      Getter method.

      Method that creates a list of tasks on the local drive

      Method that removes the task that matches the user input

      Method that searches for a specific task taking the task name as a parameter

      Method that selects the current task

      Method that filters the tasks according to date

      Method that displays the current tasks by date and filtered by project name.

      A method hidden from the user which provides a series of random tasks, projects, dates, etc.

      Method that converts objects to String in order to read the tasks and projects that where added.

        Returns:
